actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: To provide for nondiscrimination by eligible lenders in the Robert T. Stafford Federal Student Loan Program.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Preventing Student Loan Discrimination Act - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to prohibit lenders under the Federal Family Education Loan (FFEL) program from receiving special allowance payments (made to such lenders to compensate them for the difference between FFEL interest rates and market rates) if they deny FFELs to eligible borrowers because of their education program length or attendance at a particular school participating in the FFEL program.

titles.title: To provide for nondiscrimination by eligible lenders in the Robert T. Stafford Federal Student Loan Program.
